entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.1.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refs #4794 Add proxy settings by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5045
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to v8 (major) by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5011
  • Update dependency react-virtuoso to v4.10.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5026
  • Update dependency react-hotkeys-hook to v4.5.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5031
  • Update dependency postcss to v8.4.45 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5027
  • Update dependency eslint-plugin-react to v7.35.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5033
  • Update peter-evans/create-pull-request action to v7 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5034
  • Update dependency sass to v1.78.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5036
  • Update dependency megalodon to v10.0.3 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5038
  • Update dependency electron to v31.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5041
  • Update dependency eslint to v9.10.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5042
  • Update dependency typescript to v5.6.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5046
  • Update typescript-eslint monorepo to v8.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5047
  • Update dependency next to v14.2.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5039
  • Update dependency @types/node to v20.16.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5030
  • Update dependency @material-tailwind/react to v2.1.10 by @renovate in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/4837
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5048
  • Remove unused menu by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5054
  • New Crowdin updates by @h3poteto in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5055
  • [Auto update] Thirdparty libraries list by @github-actions in https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/pull/5040

Full Changelog: https://github.com/h3poteto/whalebird-desktop/compare/v6.1.4...v6.1.5

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.1.6

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.1.8
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Whalebird: 6.2.0
